page_content:
79
Growing Our Workforce for 
Long-Term Success     
With nearly 100 years of business behind us, we know our people are at the heart 
of our success. From the very beginning, we’ve hired and cultivated the best in the 
industry, and we continue to actively search, grow and develop our workforce to 
ensure we have an even more successful next 100 years. 
Though COVID-19 posed challenges for all areas of business, our employees 
persevered. We are proud to report progress in the areas of diversity, equity and 
inclusion, recruiting, employee development and experience, wellness activities and 
customer experience.
